modName: Taken Veterans - Render the Wood-Elf Champion
summary:
The Wood-Elf Champion is a resilient combat guardian.
\"Veterans\" are pre-built, skilled and equipped in tune with the limitations of their experience. The entire game is unexplored yet adapted to your new level.
descriptionHtml:
\"Veterans\" are pre-built characters, skilled and equipped in tune with the limitations of their experience. The entire game is unexplored, and adapted to your new level allowing you to try out advanced play-styles and quest-lines without the hours of involved preliminaries.

Render the Male Wood-Elf Champion
or Raster, a Female Wood-Elf Champion

Render is a level 30 combat specialist built for sustained damage output and high survivability in Skyrim\'s sometimes lengthy battles. Using Paralyze judiciously to render opponents helpless, he finishes them off with a few arrows if at range, or with a snicker-snack of dual-swords when in close-quarters. Render vanquishes his foes by staying in constant motion himself as he freezes opponents motionless around him. He divides & conquers groups of opponents, running & dodging, sniping & paralyzing until the odds favor a quick one-on-one kill. 

Render works well with a folllower and/or a pet. He can provide restorative support to melee types, or hold aggro if his follower uses ranged attacks.

There\'s nothing this Neutral Good Wood Elf enjoys more than dealing serious damage to serious evildoers. Because, when it comes to evildoers, he knows them when he sees them, and when he sees them, look out. Hunters, for example have a point--it\'s not like their poaching is harming anyone. The same cannot be said of bandits or of those engaged in senseless violence, however. Where ever in Skyrim there is a citizen in distress, Render is determined to find them and save the day.

Render has 29 unallocated Perk Points, 220 Magicka (+50 Highborn), 220 Health, and 150 Stamina.

Render\'s Skills:
	Alteration 100
	Heavy Armor, Restoration 75
	Speech, One-Handed, Archery 50
	Conjuration, Two-Handed, Destruction, Enchanting, Alchemy, Smithing, Light Armor, Pickpocket, Lockpicking, Block, Sneak, Illusion 15

1*(100*101/2) + 2*(75*76/2) + 3*(50*51/2) + 12*(15*16/2)
=16,015 [url=http://bit.ly/SkyrimExp]Total Experience Spent In Skills[/url]

Render\'s Starting Spells:
	Magelight, Detect Life, Telekinesis, Waterbreathing, Detect Dead, Ebonyflesh, Paralyze, Dragonhide, Mass Paralysis, Equilibrium
	Bound Sword, Bound Bow, Conjure Flame Atronach
	Close Wounds, Greater Ward, Heal Other, Circle of Protection, Grand Healing, Repel Undead, Turn Greater Undead
	
Render\'s Shouts:
	Disarm (Zun Haal Viik)
	Dismay (Faas Ru Maar)
	
Render\'s Additional Powers: 
	Highborn (+50 Magicka)
	Highborn (Regen Magicka Daily)
	
Render\'s Champion Equipment:
Ebony Helmet of Eminent Restoration	000cf88a
Ebony Armor of Eminent Alteration	0010cf6c
Ebony Gauntlets of Major Wielding	000cf865
Ebony Boots of Extreme Stamina	0010df85

-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Render is based on an original character concept by kbailey921, Thanks so much for the feedback & encouragement!!
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Version History
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
2.1 Master Alteration, switch to Heavy Armor, & add equipment. New looks.
2.0 Confused champion, uses light armor...
1.0 Original Version
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Whenever a character earns a rank, r, in a skill they gain r experience. So when a character has 0 in all skills they have zero experience, and when they have 100 in all skills, at level 81.5, they have 90,900 experience. A level 30 character should have about 15,865 total experience summed from their skills.

Taken Veterans should look good with any texture or mesh mods you may use, if any. The mods used in the screenshots include:
Face Textures (Female): [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3563]Coverwomen[/url]
Face Textures (Male): [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=26]Detailed Faces[/url]

Look in the discussions area for the batch commands allowing you to make a veteran out of a character you\'ve created yourself!

More Info:
[url=http://bit.ly/SkyrimExp]Experience Table[/url]
[url=http://bit.ly/SkyrimCharBatch]Tips on making your own veterans[/url]

Drop a Taken Veteran save game in your Saves folder and load it up. See what you think!
author: Taken
